name: volos-cache-apigee
description: Basic in-memory caching library for the Volos system.

scripts.coverage: bin/link;node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -u exports -R spec test/*
scripts.coveralls: bin/link;node node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec test/* && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js --verbose
